com.risk.maputils

Class LoadMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.maputils.LoadMap

  • public class LoadMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads the data from the map file and stores it in a variable
    Author:
    Chirag

                                 Map p_Map)
                          throws InvalidMapException
        This Method reads Continents from map file and add it to p_Map variable.
        Parameters:
        p_mapReader - Scanner object that helps to read map file.
        p_Map - Stores data read from p_mapReader
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - if map is not valid.

        This Method Loads the Map passed to it.
